Question
========

Lisa measured pain symptoms in her subjects every month for five months. A randomized half of the subjects were offered an intervention during this period, while the other half were not. Lisa wants to use a repeated measures ANOVA to test whether there is an effect of the intervention on the course of pain symptoms over time. What type of variable is Intervention (yes/no) in the repeated measures ANOVA? 
Answerlist
----------
* Error variable
* Mixed variable
* Within-Subjects Factor
* Between-Subjects Factor

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
